statements: UPDATE classic_cars SET color='Blue' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE classic_cars SET transmission='Automatic', engine_size=5.7 WHERE model='Mustang';
UPDATE classic_cars SET engine_size = 2.0, transmission = 'Automatic' WHERE id = 1
UPDATE classic_cars SET color = 'Red', production_year = 1965 WHERE model = 'Mustang' AND manufacturer = 'Ford'
UPDATE classic_cars SET production_year = 1975, model = 'Ferrari 308 GTB' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE manufacturers SET name = 'Fiat' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE classic_cars SET model = 'Ford Mustang', production_year = 1970 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE manufacturers SET name = 'Toyota' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE ClassicCarModels SET car_name = 'Ford Mustang GT', manufacturer = 'Ford' WHERE car_id = 1;
UPDATE CarSpecifications SET horsepower = 350, engine_type = 'V8' WHERE spec_id = 2;
UPDATE ClassicCarModels SET car_name='Ford Mustang', production_year=1965 WHERE car_id=1;
UPDATE CarSpecifications SET engine_type='V8', torque=450 WHERE car_id=2;
UPDATE classic_car_models SET production_year = 1970 WHERE car_id = 1;
UPDATE car_specifications SET weight = 1500 WHERE car_id = 2;
UPDATE classic_car_models SET production_year = 1967, country_of_origin = 'Italy' WHERE car_id = 3;
UPDATE car_specifications SET engine_size = '3.0L V6', horsepower = 300, top_speed = 150, weight = 1200 WHERE specification_id = 5;

UPDATE classic_car_models SET production_year = 1970, name = 'Camaro' WHERE id = 1;
